pullRequest.title: Fix UI issues in Role Member Review Reminder
pullRequest.bodyText:
Moved the Role Member Reminder Icon to the left so it can be hovered without being covered by the 'X'
Disabled the Reminder icon title which caused it to appear on top of the tooltip


I confirm that this contribution is made under the terms of the license found in the root directory of this repository's source tree and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

commit.message:
Fix UI issues in Role Member Review Reminder
1. Moved the Role Member Reminder Icon to the left so it can be hovered without being covered by the 'X'
2. Disabled the Reminder icon title which caused it to appear on top of the tooltip

beforeCommit.message:
Fix UI issues in Role Member Review Reminder
1. Moved the Role Member Reminder Icon to the left so it can be hovered without being covered by the 'X'
2. Disabled the Reminder icon title which caused it to appear on top of the tooltip

afterCommit.message:
Fix UI issues in Role Member Review Reminder
1. Moved the Role Member Reminder Icon to the left so it can be hovered without being covered by the 'X'
2. Disabled the Reminder icon title which caused it to appear on top of the tooltip

nodes.bodyText: I have set the default behavior to true to prevent changes in other users of Icon.js. However, there are other locations that should probably set it to false to prevent the title appearing on the tooltip (such as the icons that appear in the list of role members)
